function 2
Finish Button
format:
<template>
  <v-btn fluid class="finish-style" @click="handleClick">
    Finish
  </v-btn>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
  methods: {
    handleClick() {
      // send a message back to Node-RED
      this.send({ payload: "finished" });
      // go back to the previous page
      this.$root.$router.push("/production_plan");
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
  .finish-style {
    font-weight: 600;
    color: white !important;
    background: #e73c52 !important;
    /* ← you missed this semicolon */
    border: 0.1vw solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
    border-radius: 14px;
    box-shadow:
      0 4px 10px rgba(1, 39, 76, 0.4),
      inset 0 0 12px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
    text-transform: none;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
        /* font-size: calc(1vw + 0.5em); */
    font-size: calc(0.8vw + 0.4em);
    padding: 0.6em 1.2em;
    transition: all 0.25s ease;
    cursor: pointer;
    overflow: hidden;
      max-height: calc( 2 * var(--widget-row-height)); 
  }

  .finish-style:hover,
  .finish-style:focus {
    background: #b52f43 !important;
    /* darker red for hover */
    box-shadow:
      0 6px 16px rgba(1, 39, 76, 0.5),
      inset 0 0 14px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
    border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
  }

  .finish-style:active {
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  }
</style>

function 5
Close App Button
format:
<template>
  <Teleport v-if="mounted" to="#app-bar-actions">
    <v-btn icon color="red" variant="text" @click="send({ payload: 'close' })">
      <v-icon>mdi-close</v-icon>
    </v-btn>
  </Teleport>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
        data() {
            return {
                mounted: false
            }
        },
        mounted() {
          setTimeout(() => {
            this.mounted = true
          }, 10)
        }
    }
</script>

name: Wifi Icon
format:
<template>
  <Teleport v-if="mounted" to="#app-bar-actions">
    <v-btn icon variant="text" :color="wifiConnected ? 'green' : 'red'" @click.stop="">
      <v-icon>{{ wifiConnected ? 'mdi-wifi' : 'mdi-wifi-off' }}</v-icon>
    </v-btn>
  </Teleport>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
  data() {
    return {
      mounted: false,
      wifiConnected: false
    };
  },

  mounted() {
    this.mounted = true;
  },

  watch: {
    msg(newMsg) {
      if (!newMsg || newMsg.payload == null) return;
      this.wifiConnected = newMsg.payload === "Connected";
    }
  }
};
</script>
